AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manufactured
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This Battle Driod was made in a Factory somewhere in the outer rim with other Droids, It waiting to receive orders

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: T-Series Tactical Droid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created as a Tactical Droid to serve For The Separatist Droid Army
